title: Ultimate app for root users
comment: This is the perfect solution if you have any issues in overclocking your device. I seem to be having trouble getting my CPU clock speeds set in setcpu. Every time I set the CPU clock speed to whatever speed I want, After 5-15 mins in sleep mode it turns itself back up to the max speed that is allowed (528 mhz). With this wonderful app, I was able to turn off the thermald option under thermal section. Fortunately, from now it works like a charm. Thanks to those developers.

title: Simple. Elegant. Works!
comment: Tried several different Kernel Tweaking apps and this one is by far the best in terms of ability and aesthetics. Love the material look and it has every single thing I could possibly want to tune. No scripts to flash in recovery, no crashing, no freezing, no problems. Running Code_Blue kernel on Nexus 5
